channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Resident using parking bays for his Motor Trade, 28th October
item.description:
Number 17 of squires house barnfield road has many vehicles (around 20+) around the barnfield estate there is about 7 in barnfield road. These vehicles aren’t taxed and has no mot or insurance and don’t get moved as he parks them to sell them. This is causing a major problem with us and all other residents as we have reported and reported this for years and no action seem to be taken. due to circumstances with our family and maybe other residents we sometimes work late and when we come back to our estate we have no where to park let alone park next to our houses due to this problem. causing us to park on double yellows and single yellows and getting tickets which we can’t afford to pay when it’s caused but a resident using bays as his motor trade.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barnfield Road, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: From 70 to 116 Tennyson. Particularly bad around 82 Tennyson., 28th October
item.description:
This side of Tennyson is a very busy public highway/pathway as it’s on the way to the local school and dog walking area. It has not been swept in a very very long time. There are now a lot of leaves which have gone mouldy and slippery with rain and it’s now very slippery and dangerous.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Tennyson Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Another fly tip, 28th October
